documents.document: @GoonerGirl1969 @goonerdave66 Just what I cld fit into 140 to make it clear I think the media have strung fans out with this one.
@GoonerGirl1969 @goonerdave66 I sld make it clear I wasn't calling either of you fools. You both seem to have taken it that way so sorry.
@GoonerGirl1969 @goonerdave66 I don't know anybody who screams at fans who dare criticise him to be honest. I will side with him over media.
@goonerdave66 @GoonerGirl1969 Used to turn Gooners against their own manager and club. And so many are over this story.
@goonerdave66 @GoonerGirl1969 Not meaning to say you are foolish Dave. Just that I feel it is a negative over reaction abt nothing.
@goonerdave66 @GoonerGirl1969 Perhaps he could have dodged the question. Would that make a difference? Media just playing our fans as fools.
@GoonerGirl1969 @goonerdave66 ridiculous to blame Wenger for this. Was asked by journo 'kante did you ever look to sign him?'
@Fattcheeked I see. Yes I guess there wasn't so much controversy here over Barry's Eos! Amazing years to get obamacare and Iran deal wasted!
It seemed top level sport was being driven further and further to dominance of youth. Lately seems to be a resurgence of the older athlete!
@Fattcheeked so why couldn't Obama sign executive orders like this? Over what I consider good things?!
@Fattcheeked I understand that some ppl view what he is doing as positive. But how are those changes coming so quickly?
Isn't it astonishing how it took @BarackObama years to make progress but it is taking Trump days to undo all the good work?!
@Arsenal1206 just close the window to close it. Click on the icon in bottom right corner and x it shut!
@Arsenal1206 scam don't touch it.
Super strange writing a referral letter back to my first ever Hospital consultant when I was a baby FY1! Wonder if she will recognise me!
@RyanTomes them and Liverpool. They give so much noise out because of those jammy wins.

Headline: 'Wenger gives Arsenal flops an absolutely normal recovery program followed by any top level football team'
Not clickbaity enough?
It is so hard going from @BarackObama perhaps the greatest orator in the world today to Donald Trump.
@N5_1BU Wow really?! That is pretty deep! I only remember them from the great sides they had in late 90s early 00s!
@Goonermatt1886 Exactly and when Alexis was first put up top 'He is never a striker, we can't play him there' lol round and round we go!
@N5_1BU Ah I see! Wondered how you could have been keen on him so early! I had only seen him once or twice before. Lovely player!
@N5_1BU I don't mind him starting. He has done well whenever he plays. But was injured for a stretch and only recently coming back in!
@N5_1BU For me it is a way of being negative about player Y. Can't we just support the team? Whoever is playing?
@Goonermatt1886 I've seen so many who complain incessantly abt Ox when he does play saying 'what has he got to do to get a start'!
Still a common trend with Arsenal fans to really really want player X playing over whoever is actually picked. Latest love is Lucas.
@Fattcheeked There was one point Kaboul had both his arms in a lock holding him. Fk was given to Kaboul!
@Fattcheeked That was madness. Never a foul. And then Kaboul is kicking lumps out of Giroud with not even a hint of a Fk being given!
@RyanTomes Like when Ozil was fouled and ball broke to Deeney. Waited 5 secs before blowing. Then said he was playing advantage! To WHO?
@Fattcheeked Not only shit it was completely and obviously biased. So many fouls not called for us whereas any contact on Watford was a FK.
Terrible news for Callum Wilson as he has ruptured his cruciate ligament. Not sure if same knee or other side to that he did last year.
@Stillberto @arseblog With the way Jose behaves I am not sure even this would embarrass him. Surprised the Sunday Times stand for it though.
@arseblog @Stillberto Have you ever seen a journalist so clearly become a part of a manager's PR team? It is really really Bizarre.
@jackthegooner1 Haha too true. Though the headlines don't really match what was said to be fair to the Trumpster.
@Welsh_Gooner haha! You know you will still go!! We are suckers for this club whatever they do to us!
@teaandabikkie Yes there were definitely complaints.
@teaandabikkie somehow disagrees with you.
@teaandabikkie so does this guy. https://t.co/t95Oh5ej8H
People you face far greater danger to you and your loved ones health from the loss of the NHS to privatisation than from ISIS. Believe that.
@teaandabikkie that in the Metro unfortunately. You should ask yourself why. And if you don't then you are in denial.
@teaandabikkie I believe there is a danger. But for you personally the loss of the NHS is far greater danger than ISIS. But you won't read..
@teaandabikkie 'Louis says ISIS would have no hesitation to destroy mankind with an overdose of Custard Creams' and that warrants a ban?
@teaandabikkie Not one of these articles provides any evidence of what you claim to have intelligence of? I cld claim something myself!
@teaandabikkie I don't believe in them. I am sure whatever intelligence is released to the public is done not for protective purposes.
@teaandabikkie but somehow you believe in a country where more ppl have been killed by toddlers than terrorists that this is warranted!
@Dav1dOLeary The ban composes only Muslim majority countries and excludes those of minority religions from those countries.
@teaandabikkie What do you base this upon? Can I have evidence of the intelligence reports you have access to?
@teaandabikkie It has zero to do with intelligence reports and lots to do with provoking a reaction.
@teaandabikkie Trump himself does not believe this ban enhances the safety of Americans. His only aim is to please supporters.
@Dav1dOLeary Donald Trump had a different view on this to you: https://t.co/nOeyzySPEZ
@teaandabikkie Do you think this ban is an effective measure of weeding them out?
@teaandabikkie I wonder if the intelligence agencies have looked at the perpetrators of terrorist acts in the last 10 years and origin?
What difference does it make if the #MuslimBan excludes Uk Citizens?! Are we more important than other humans? Because of our passport?
May invites a fascist racist for a state visit against the wishes of many ppl. 'He leads a protest I lead a country' Irrelevant no?!!
May Lied on Trident misfire her response? 'I want to defend this country, Corbyn does not' Irrelevant no!?
It seems the media haven't tired of May using insults to Corbyn as her get out clause for her many faults. I wonder if the public are?
@jackthegooner1 What you wld find is other FANS don't agree. Their managers and team mates wld take Ozil 100% of the time.
@jackthegooner1 I know you are not his biggest fan but he is too good for compeitition. Wld walk in to any team in the prem as a starter.
@jackthegooner1 I think the problem is his best position is as a 10. But he will never play there ahead of Ozil for us. not suited to being8
@jackthegooner1 He didn't play well which was a factor. I Wonder how far into the game he started feeling his calf injury.
@davearmstrong8 Not easy to be composed as an Arsenal fan for sure! Well a win on sat and we can dream again.......
@davearmstrong8 Yep but that stops any sensible analysis of our games or results.
@awosss But that makes my point even stronger. You could get a new top manager (Klopp) and still lose games in the same way.
@davearmstrong8 Too true. Some of the Outs have built up animosity through familiarity with Wenger's faults over the 20 years.
Take for eg LFC losing last 2 home games before CFC. It wld be silly for LFC fans to think sacking Klopp gives them 2 wins in those games.
The outs would say replace Wenger and we win last night. That is very very far from certain. And actually on probability less likely.
The problem with the Wenger in/out thing is that for many all our problems are binary like that. In truth top level sport far more complex.
@jackthegooner1 I think it is a bit easy to blame 'mentality' it looks that way as fans but there is more to it than that.
@jackthegooner1 Silvinho and Winterburn hardly ever scored but occasionally those go in. Have to try. Alexis always does that.
@jackthegooner1 We probably needed a goal in the first half. Monreal volley wasn't wrong thing. Gab attacking so much was odd though.
@jackthegooner1 Just crazy to think we would make that same mistake so many times. Even if we kept it 1-0 was ok. 2nd goal was a joke.
@fkhanage @AngryOfN5 @goonerdave66 it is strange how rarely we start first half how we started the second. Why can't we do that?
It looks simple. You say if we started the first half of these games with the intensity we started the second we would win comfortably.
Ox on the other hand was fantastic again tonight. Excellent performance. Maybe the middle of the park really is his thing.
Gab: poor throw+no recovery run Ramsey: not ready for throw+no recovery run Coq: beaten too easily Mustafi: beaten too easily
First goal could be a little unlucky with the deflection. Just don't concede a second. Looking at amount of players at fault for 2nd is nuts
The hardest thing about tonight is it comes again just after you start to build up hope for this team. They then let you down. Ungently.
Seeing ppl defending America's #MuslimBan with the issue that some Muslim countries ban Israelis. Since when did two wrongs make a right?!
@jackthegooner1 Are you suggesting that everyone was completely aware of just how bad Hitler wld turn out to be from 1933?
"Those ppl who say they wld have stood up to the Nazi's, believe me they wld not have done" Fascinating subject an… https://t.co/BbXc2i8npf
@jackthegooner1 I thought you knew everything about Nazi Germany? This is quite well documented. Being there helps but I can read also.
@jackthegooner1 I am sure you have seen the stats on Americans killed by Islamic terrorism and also the ban countries vs business interests?
@jackthegooner1 I am certain. Absolutely certain many people felt that way about Hitler in 1933. And said the same thing.
@jackthegooner1 do you know in 30s Britain there were some who supported Hitler and felt we sld side with him? Including politicians.
@jackthegooner1 are ignoring is the process of history. Which was my point. Hitler didn't start off killing Jews and invading places.
@jackthegooner1 what you are saying, as many do, is that Trump is not as bad as Hitler RIGHT NOW so bowing down to him is ok. But what you..
@jackthegooner1 remember when Hitler was elected he could also conceivably be voted out. Yes he formed a 'union' with Austria. That ok then?
@jackthegooner1 do you think Hitler started off invading countries? He won power in 33. Invaded Austria in 38.
It is obvious that If May was PM in the 30s she would have been inviting Hitler over and pushing the economic benefits of ties with Germany.
@anazrof astonishing the difference in reaction between them. She is hopeless.
Considering the Brexit vote I would love to see a poll of how many Brits who agree with Trump's #MuslimBan could be a frightening result.
Why should we be surprised the Tories are so willing to jump on board with Trump? There is a long line of previous here.
@Fattcheeked @DuncanCastles it is a bit mental though isn't it? I've never seen a journo simply become a manager's PR like this!
Mourinho subs his GK and United score seconds later. Tactical genius on a par with LVG. United fans will love that.
Interesting how many of the longer rallies Federer came out on top of. Especially towards the end of the match.
Brilliant how Roger has adapted to keep himself up with the progress of the sport. Broke his final taboo this tournament The medical timeout
@JordyGreaves I wasn't playing! I've retired from Sunday's!
When he retires @RafaelNadal should write a book on how he was so strong psychologically. Always plays his best at key points.
Whatever you do @rogerfederer let Mirka run the baths this evening please?!
5 Australian opens and 5 Us Open titles. Surely @rogerfederer the greatest hard court player of all time?
Wow. They didn't let us down. So glad @rogerfederer won this! 18!! What an inspiration! #FedererNadal
